[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_button button_url=”/contact/” button_text=”Contact Us” button_alignment=”right” admin_label=”Button” _builder_version=”3.19.2″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”11px” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_color=”rgba(177,255,177,0)” button_border_color=”#ffffff” button_border_radius=”4px” button_letter_spacing=”1px” button_font=”|600|||||||” button_use_icon=”off” custom_padding=”8px|32px|8px|32px|true|true” global_colors_info=”{}” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on” button_bg_color__hover=”#ffffff” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on” button_text_color__hover=”#156573″ button_border_color__hover_enabled=”on” button_border_color__hover=”#ffffff”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.2.2″ custom_margin=”40px|||” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”0px||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding=”100px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#ffffff” header_font_size=”62px” header_letter_spacing=”-1.25px” header_line_height=”1.4em” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”75%” max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_phone=”100%” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”center” header_font_size_tablet=”42px” header_font_size_phone=”32px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We help the world’s top companies build highly polished products.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/contact/” button_text=”Let’s Get Started” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”3.19.2″ custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_use_color_gradient=”on” button_bg_color_gradient_start=”#5DE455″ button_bg_color_gradient_end=”#14C0AA” button_bg_color_gradient_direction=”210deg” button_border_width=”0px” button_letter_spacing=”1px” button_font=”|600||on|||||” button_use_icon=”off” custom_padding=”20px|72px|20px|72px” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_vertical=”26px” box_shadow_blur=”92px” box_shadow_spread=”3px” box_shadow_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.2)” global_colors_info=”{}” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on”][/et_pb_button][et_pb_text disabled_on=”on|off|off” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”22px” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”65%” max_width_tablet=”” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We’re more then an app development shop. We’re a fully integrated team of product specialist, strategist, and business development experts.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.2.2″ background_image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/right-bg-ornament.svg” background_size=”initial” background_position=”center_right” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_padding=”100px|0px|58px|0px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”50px|0px|58px|0px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.2.2″ width_tablet=”” width_phone=”100%” width_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.2.2″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.2.2″ header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”||||||||” header_3_font_size=”24px” max_width=”60%” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We believe innovative technology can transform businesses when it’s implemented thoughtfully and accessible by like-minded communities. Unfortunately, often times applications are built with barriers that shield innovation from the tools and people who need them.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ max_width=”60%” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Founded in 2017 with an Austin, Texas headquarters, Brightscout now serves a number of the top brands and startups around the globe. Our growing team of experts spans 24 time zones – from San Francisco to London, Belgrade to Bangladesh and more.

Each person at Brightscout brings their own unique perspective and personality to the team and we value that – whether it’s an obsession for good coffee, love of memes, excitement for astrophysics, passion for travel, the quest for exceptional food or something else.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ header_6_font_size=”18px” header_6_letter_spacing=”1.5px” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Multi-discipline Design

Our design team is built with specialization in mind. Each team works together to execute at a high-level with velocity.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/Product-Management.svg” align=”center” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”3.23″ animation_style=”flip” animation_direction=”bottom” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_6_font=”|600||on|||||” header_6_font_size=”18px” header_6_letter_spacing=”1.5px” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Product Management

Brilliant design can only do too much, our product managers, manage the design build process and can overcome any complex barriers.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/Engineering.svg” align=”center” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”3.23″ animation_style=”flip” animation_direction=”top” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_6_font=”|600||on|||||” header_6_font_size=”18px” header_6_letter_spacing=”1.5px” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Engineering

Our engineering team is built to solve problems. We take pride in being the builders and fixers where others often fail.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/Business-Strategy.svg” align=”center” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”3.23″ animation_style=”flip” animation_direction=”bottom” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_6_font=”|600||on|||||” header_6_font_size=”18px” header_6_letter_spacing=”1.5px” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Business Strategy

Strategy and operations architecture can be built out for any business so you can start executing immediately without all the heartburn.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ background_image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/left-ornament3.svg” background_size=”initial” background_position=”center_left” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ make_equal=”on” padding_top_bottom_link_1=”true” padding_top_bottom_link_2=”true” padding_left_right_link_1=”true” padding_left_right_link_2=”true” module_class=”vdivide” _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|0||0px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”40px|40px|40px|40px” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”|700||on|||||” text_text_color=”#54b454″ text_font_size=”20px” text_letter_spacing=”2.5px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||16px” custom_padding=”||” animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Confidence in Approach

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_4_font=”||||||||” header_4_font_size=”28px” header_4_line_height=”1.8em” text_orientation=”center” custom_padding=”|32px||32px||true” animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Start from the Bottom.

All big companies started somewhere, let’s build the future together.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/deployment-illustration@3x.svg” align=”center” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”3.23″ custom_margin=”72px||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” custom_css_main_element=”margin:auto auto 0;” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”40px|40px|40px|40px” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” _builder_version=”4.0″ text_font=”|700||on|||||” text_text_color=”#54b454″ text_font_size=”20px” text_letter_spacing=”2.5px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||16px” animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”]Building with Confidence[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.0″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_4_font=”||||||||” header_4_font_size=”28px” header_4_line_height=”1.8em” text_orientation=”center” custom_padding=”|32px||32px||true” animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Taking it to the Next Level.

Helping established companies build their next big thing or just innovating on what’s there.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/development-illustration@3x.svg” align=”center” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”3.23″ custom_margin=”72px||40px” animation_style=”slide” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”80px|0px|29px|0px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”|700||on|||||” text_text_color=”#54b454″ text_font_size=”20px” text_letter_spacing=”2.5px” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”]

OUR TEAM

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_font_size=”48px” header_2_letter_spacing=”-1px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||” animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Global Team of Elite Product and Business Experts

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”4px” _builder_version=”3.19.9″ max_width=”8%” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” custom_margin=”24px||32px” animation_style=”zoom” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”20px” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”]Led by enterprise software veterans, our team is comprised of trustworthy experts across a range of disciplines including project management, design, systems and network administration, security, devops, and development with experience on some of the most complex and interesting tech verticals.[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/world-map@2x.png” align=”center” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”3.23″ custom_margin=”72px||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ background_image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/right-bg-ornament-bottom.svg” background_size=”contain” background_position=”bottom_right” custom_padding=”58px|0px|80px|0px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”48px|48px|48px|48px|true|true” border_radii=”on|6px|6px|6px|6px” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”#dde8e6″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_font=”||||||||” header_4_font=”||||||||” header_4_font_size=”28px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Join the team. Help us build the universal payments infrastructure of the internet.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_button button_url=”/careers/” button_text=”Join the Team” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”3.19.2″ custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_use_color_gradient=”on” button_bg_color_gradient_start=”#58BA52″ button_bg_color_gradient_end=”#2f8f83″ button_bg_color_gradient_direction=”210deg” button_border_width=”0px” button_letter_spacing=”1px” button_font=”|600||on|||||” button_use_icon=”off” custom_margin=”15px||16px” custom_padding=”20px|72px|20px|72px” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_vertical=”26px” box_shadow_blur=”92px” box_shadow_spread=”3px” box_shadow_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.2)” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
